column2: Prologue]] to ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.

column1: ''Concerning Pipe-weed'' explains the [[Hobbits]]' fascination with [[pipe-weed]], its history (as laid out in [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]]'s ''[[Herblore of the Shire]]'') and the notable varieties of [[Old Toby]], [[Longbottom Leaf]] and [[Southern Star]].
